comment.author: 39917224@N07
comment._content: Hi! I really like your work! My name is Florian, I’m from the World Identity Lab, and the reason I contact you is because we are currently running a photo-project which is about special places. We are a noncommercial, experimental platform - we invite interesting people from all over the world to contribute their work to our projects. We believe that every person has at least one place somewhere in the world which is strongly connected to a certain experience to his / her life. The Lab’s aim is to create a very personal online-map with special places of our contributors worldwide to share. (That’s why they should be easy accessible!) It would be great if you could contribute your special place, because your style would really fit to us. Here is all the info you need - it’s very easy: www.worldidentitylab.net/project/current/nowhere-now-here/ If you have any questions you can write me a mail: florian.greimel@worldidentitylab.net Thanks! Keep on shooting :) Florian and the World Identity Lab Team
